Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Scenes Skill and Alexa, you can simply control your Scenes One Cameras to look over your properties.

Before you get started, please make sure your Scenes Cam is online and updated to the latest firmware. Then enable the Scenes Skill in Alexa app or ask Alexa to enable the skill by saying "Alexa, enable the Scenes Skill" and you will be directed to link your Scenes account with your Alexa account.

You can view live feed and listen to the audio from your Scenes Cam devices. Alexa also works with the shared users so anyone with access to the camera can view the activity. But please note that you will not be able to speak to people through your Alexa devices.
You can now access your Scenes one Cam via voice control by simply saying "Alexa, show my front door camera.” Or you can say “Alexa, show me the last footage of the yard” to simply review the events on your Echo Show. 

Some example commands are:

"Alexa, show my front door."
"Alexa, show my basement."
"Alexa, stop."

Compatible Amazon Alexa Devices:

Echo Show
Echo dot
